name: 王友恭
objective: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧推估並了解不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
schedule:
Main Topics :
① Introduction of engineering economics .
② Time value of money , interest and economic equivalence .
③ Cash flow and time value of money formulas .
④ developing the cash flow for alternatives .
⑤ Comparing and selecting mutually exclusive alternatives .
⑥ Effect of Inflation
⑦ Depreciation Method
⑧ After tax Analysis
⑨ Application of Engineering Economics in infrastructure investment
scorePolicy:
Grading system :
① Homework & Attendance    20%
② Midterm Exam.            35%
③ Final Exam.              45%
